commits.author: pyfisch
commits.body:
Correctly highlight quoted key/value pairs if the value starts with an equals sign.
Don't mark datetimes with space instead of T as invalid.
Don't mark local time as invalid.
Allow leading zeros in float exponent.
Accept multi-line strings with inner quotes at the end. 


Closes #11 
Closes #12 
Closes #13

commits.author: ToruNiina
commits.summary: Allow special numeric values in an array

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Split numeric constants into separate rules
commits.body: For both clarity and to improve scoping specificity.

commits.author: ToruNiina
commits.summary: Allow nan, inf, hex, oct, bin numeric values

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body:
Keys in the form:

    physical.shape = "round"
    site."google.com" = true

Based on a commit originally submitted as PR #9 from @ToruNiina
